content: मुरजः [मुरात् वेष्टनात् जायते जण्-ड <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A kind of drum or tabor; सानंदं नंदिहस्ताहतमुरजरव &c. <ls>Māl. 1. 1</ls>; संगीताय प्रहतमुरजाः <ls>Me. 64</ls>, <ls n="Me.">56</ls>; <ls>M. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 40.</ls> {@--2@} A stanza artificially arranged in the form of a drum; also called मुरजबंध, see <ls>K. P. 9.</ls> {%ad loc.%}
